message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.  I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $120 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I'm still a bit far from $170. Can we meet at $145?
